sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; function About() { return (

About Bernard

  • Bernard is a journalist based out of Los Angeles. He is currently the News editor at the Daily Bruin, the independent student newspaper at UCLA, and a third-year Applied Mathematics student. He is also a contributor for CalMatters as part of its College Journalism Network. Bernard enjoys reporting on positions of power, creating data visualizations and playing with front-end web development. In his free time, Bernard enjoys following the Buffalo Bills and tracking the vintage wristwatch market. You can contact Bernard at contact@bernardmendez.com.

Quick Links

  • Twitter ❏
  • LinkedIn ❏
  • Resume ❏

Experience

  • News editor, Daily Bruin ❏ - present
  • Contributor, CalMatters ❏ - present
  • Data Journalist, The Stack ❏ - 2019 to 2020
  • Staff reporter, Daily Bruin ❏ - 2019 to 2020

Freelance Reporting

  • N/A - Contact Bernard at bernard.h.mendez@gmail.com ❏

Coding

  • Object-oriented: Python ❏, C++ ❏, Javascript ❏
  • Front-end: Javascript ❏, React ❏, CSS, HTML

Contact

  • Email: contact@bernardmendez.com
  • PGP: [Numbers]
  • Signal: [Numbers]
); } export default About;
